title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace目录存在且模板文件齐全

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 含非空关键词

title: Collect candidate papers (multi-route) and normalize metadata
acceptance: papers_raw.jsonl >= 200 条记录（survey 目标），且每条含 title/authors/year/url + 稳定标识（arxiv_id/doi）+ provenance；retrieval_report.md 记录来源/覆盖桶/缺失字段统计

title: Dedupe+rank and produce core set
acceptance: 去重后重复率<2%，dedup 池足够大；survey 目标 core_set >=150（为后续 citations>=150 与每小节证据绑定留出空间）

title: Build taxonomy (2-level minimum)
acceptance: taxonomy至少2层且节点有说明

title: Build outline bullets from taxonomy
acceptance: outline含章节+小节，且每小节至少3个bullet

title: Map papers to each subsection
acceptance: 每小节映射>=3篇论文，覆盖率>=80%

title: Draft C2 review summary (scope+outline)
acceptance: DECISIONS含C2 review摘要

title: HUMAN approve C2 (scope+outline)
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C2

title: Download PDFs + extract fulltext snippets
acceptance: fulltext_index非空；若 evidence_mode=fulltext 则需若干篇提取成功（strict 会拦截接近0）

title: Write paper notes for core set
acceptance: core_set覆盖率100%；标注 evidence_level；每篇至少1条limitation（避免大量重复模板）

title: Build subsection briefs (writing cards) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3生成写作意图卡（scope_rule/rq/axes/clusters/paragraph_plan），无省略号/无占位符

title: Verify citations and build ref.bib
acceptance: ref.bib每条都有verified.jsonl记录（url+date+title）

title: Build evidence packs per subsection [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3有证据包（>=3 concrete comparisons；evidence_snippets非空；blocking_missing为空）

title: Rewrite claim-evidence matrix from evidence packs [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 矩阵以 evidence packs 为准：每小节含 `- Claim:` 且 `Evidence:`>=2；无占位/无模板句/无省略号

title: Define table schemas (schema-first) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: table_schema.md 定义>=2张表（问题+列+证据来源），无占位/无省略号

title: Fill tables from evidence packs [NO PROSE]
acceptance: tables.md 至少2张表，行内含 citations，且无占位/无省略号

title: Draft visuals (timeline/figures) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: timeline>=8条且含引用；figures>=2个spec；无TODO/无SCAFFOLD

title: Weave transitions (no new facts) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: transitions.md 生成可读过渡句（无新事实/无引用）；无占位/无省略号

title: Write draft (after C2 approval)
acceptance: 根据 briefs+evidence packs 逐节写作（不少于 8 页 PDF 所需长度）；引用key必须来自ref.bib

title: Polish draft (de-template + coherence)
acceptance: 去除套话/ellipsis/模板句；保持引用不变；通过 draft 质量门槛（strict gate）

title: Global consistency review (terminology + RQ closure)
acceptance: GLOBAL_REVIEW.md 完整（Status: PASS）且 draft 通过质量门槛；术语一致、结论回扣主线
